partintro.para: Simpleweb VO Plugin is composed of sample codes created by using the common Controller class and tag libraries that use VO(Value Object) as Transfer Object and reference libraries necessary to use them to help developers to develop Spring MVC-based web applications more easily and simply.
Install simpleweb-vo plugin by entering the following command in the Command window.
The installation result can be checked by using the installed (mvn anyframe:installed) or the jetty:run (mvn clean jetty:run) commands.
